net.ddns.drj7z.poc.gson
Class GsonTypeAdapterFactory

java.lang.Object
  net.ddns.drj7z.poc.gson.GsonTypeAdapterFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
public class GsonTypeAdapterFactory
extends Object
implements com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory

Interface type adapter for Gson. Allows to serialize and deserialize a field which "type" is an interface. When serialized the field is written as an array which members: [0] is the actual class name of the instance concrete type. [1] is the json representation of the instance. When deserialized an instance of concrete type is created -reading its name from element [0]- and then it is filled with values from element [1].

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
drj7z
